snippet.title: I, Dracula: Genesis - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Please add us to wishlist on Steam, would help a great deal. If you like it, of course! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1175360/I_Dracula_Genesis/

At last, after 5 YEARS in development, we are proud to announce the game is going to be released in early 2020, probably around March.

I,DRACULA: GENESIS is a rogue-lite isometric twin-stick shooter, hard-crafted in a beautiful pixelart style.

Procedural generation, lots and lots of upgradeable weapons, spells, perks, alien artefacts, strange technological and magical devices, enemies, NPCs, traps, custom events and hidden shops. So many of those, you'll feel overpowered.

Visit our website for more news & infos: https://idracu.la

#roguelike #game #trailer #pixelart #indiegames #bestindiegames #gamedev #steam #switch #ps4 #nintendo
